segments.text: Do you have any particular conditions that you would like our firm to take into consideration ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . My house is far away from here . May I ask for an apartment ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem . We can offer you a flat with two bedrooms and a living room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s great . If you don ’ t mind my asking , does your company give bonuses ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You ’ ll get bonuses at the end of each year according to your achievements . Besides , we offer you 1 % commission on all your sales .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , just one more thing , could you give me some idea about holidays ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can have Saturdays and Sundays off . In addition , you may have a paid month vacation every year . But when it is necessary , we do expect you to work overtime . Does it suit you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you are satisfied with the conditions here , please sign this contract and give it to me .
segments.speaker: S1
